channel.title: Cant find how to add shops
channel.description:
Been watching this vid http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sIBxOafZXZ8 and i use this client:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ug1muF_VUVwis
but i cant find where all the shops are and how to edit where they are and which npc is the shop owner i have tried "shops" but thats just what is sold in the shops, not where the shop is ext
plz help :/

item.title: Cant find how to add shops
item.dc:creator: @mrplumb mrplumb
item.description:
@mrplumb wrote:

kk ty

soz but i really dont get this

[code]"In Delta, shops are configured through the shops.cfg file. This is also how the shops load in Project Insanity sources.

The configuration file is located (Data/cfg/shops.cfg)

The code is in a format like this:
Code (Java): [Select]
shop = SHOP_ID [tab] SHOP_NAME [tab] DESCRIPTION [tab] ITEM_ID [tab] AMOUNT [tab] ITEM_ID [tab] AMOUNTThis code is just how Delta loads shops.

Though, to make an NPC open a shop, Delta uses something similar to ‘WanneShop’
We no longer use that process in Project Insanity.
To make an NPC open a shop, you are going to have to open your npc2.py,
located: (Data/scripts/player/npc/npc2.py)
Once you open that, you should see something similar to this format:
Code (Java): [Select]
def npcClick2_NPC_ID(c, npcId):
c.getShops().openShop(SHOP_ID)You must replace the two constants NPC_ID and SHOP_ID with the appropriate integer.

If the scripts are not loading, you must enable your ScriptManager.
To do so, find you Server class, located: src/server/Server.java.

Once you have that opened, you need to add the following import:
Code (Java): [Select]
import server.util.ScriptManager;After you have the ScriptManager imported, you need to find the main void.
Code (Java): [Select]
public static void main(java.lang.String args[]) throws NullPointerException, IOException {Inside this void, you need to add;
Code (Java): [Select]
ScriptManager.loadScripts();And you’re done!"[/code]

Do i “You must replace the two constants NPC_ID and SHOP_ID with the appropriate integer.” replace

def npcClick2_537(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(9)

with my own?

also how do u do “Once you have that opened, you need to add the following import:” where do u add this in the server.java?
and where do u add the “Inside this void, you need to add” where do u do this inside the main void?

Read full topic
item.source: Cant find how to add shops
